remarks: Two ways to express that vectors have different spans.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2015.)
statement:
lspsnne2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnne2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnne2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspsnne2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsnne2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspsnne2.e $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspsnne2 $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
